metadata.title: What Part Numbers support boundary scan?

sections.content:
Question:
What Part Numbers support boundary scan?
Answer:
For the part numbers that support boundary scan, refer to the "Boundary Scan" chapter of the User’s Manual: Hardware.
But there are part numbers in the same group that do not support boundary scan.
The BSDL files for part numbers that support boundary scan can be downloaded from the respective product pages.
Suitable Products
RX Family
